title: Ford Mustang Mach-E: First Impressions
description: Head to  and activate Honey for free to start saving today! Thanks to Honey for sponsoring this video.  The Ford Mustang Mach-E is fairly controversial, not because it's an electric vehicle but because it has the Mustang name. It's a fairly interesting car loaded with a ton of features!  Thanks to MSA Ford for providing us the Mustang Mach-E, check their Mach-E inventory at   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
